item.title: Use Whisper for Dictation
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Install python Refer Install python with Miniconda to install python 3.10.10 Install PyTorch Get the following conda command from https://pytorch.org/get-started/locally/ 1 2 3 4 # Start "Anaconda prompt", or %windir%\System32\cmd.exe "/K" C:\Users\vma\miniconda3\Scripts\activate.bat C:\Users\vma\miniconda3 conda install pytorch torchvision torchaudio cpuonly -c pytorch Install Chocolatey Refer https://chocolatey.org/Finstall to get a one liner (from Administrator prompt) like this: 1 Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.
